title: Read Like a Radiologist: Efficient Vision-Language Model for 3D Medical Imaging Interpretation
details: C Lee, S Park, CI Shin, WH Choi, HJ Park, JE Lee… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Recent medical vision-language models (VLMs) have shown promise in 2D medical image interpretation. However extending them to 3D medical imaging has been challenging due to computational complexities and data scarcity. Although a few …

title: Dual multi scale networks for medical image segmentation using contrastive learning
details: A Dhamale, R Rajalakshmi, A Balasundaram - Image and Vision Computing, 2024
abstract: DMSNet, a novel model for medical image segmentation is proposed in this research work. DMSNet employs a dual multi-scale architecture, combining the computational efficiency of EfficientNet B5 with the contextual understanding of the Pyramid Vision …
